name: Breathable Krypton
description:
Made merely so I could prove to myself that I'm able to finish a project from start to finish and not enginedev until the heat death of the universe.

Breathable Krypton is a surreal exploration/walking sim game.

Can *YOU* collect all 20 trinkets and uncover the mysteries that this strange world holds.

Made from the ground up with passion and love in only 7 days.

Controls:

WASD - movement

TYUGHJBNM - manipulate

Enter - confirm manipulation

Backspace - cancel all manipulation

F1 - adjust resolution

F2 - mute/unmute music

Fonts used in the game are:

Bilden-Regular fontesk.com/bilden-font/

DTWorldTour-Regular fontesk.com/world-tour-font/
